description: Smoked trout is a delicious addition to poached eggs on toast for breakfast or brunch.
name: Smoked Trout, Poached Eggs & Greens On Toast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium lemon, 1/2 cut into wedges, 1/2 zest

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to the boil along with the vinegar and reduce the heat to a gentle simmer. Carefully lower each egg in, cook for 3 minutes, remove gently with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen paper.
Blanch the asparagus in another pot of boiling water for 1 minute and drain. Melt half of the butter in a pan on medium heat and wilt the spinach with lemon zest. Stir through the asparagus.
Toast the sourdough to your liking, butter each slice, top with smoked trout slices, greens and poached eggs and serve with lemon wedges.
